column1: EV005
There's a HM that someone threw away... Better get going!
column2: Hay una MO abandonada... ¡Mejor me voy ya!

column1: Move Deleter
Uh...\nOh, yes, I'm the Move Deleter.
Pokémon can forget any move when they learn a new one, even HMs.
column2: Un Pokémon puede olvidar cualquier movimiento al aprender uno nuevo, incluso las MO.

column1: But if you want your Pokémon to forget a move for another reason, I can do that for you.
column2: Pero si quieres que tu Pokémon olvide un movimiento por otra razón, puedo hacerlo por ti.

column1: Would you like me to make your Pokémon forget a move?
column2: ¿Quieres que haga que tu Pokémon olvide un movimiento?

column1: Yes
No
Which Pokémon should forget a move?
If Game Variable 1 is less than 0, it means the player has canceled choosing a Pokémon.
column2: If Game Variable 1 is less than 0, it means the player has canceled choosing a Pokémon.

column1: Come again if there are moves that need to be forgotten.
column2: Pasa de nuevo si quieres que tu Pokémon olvide algún movimiento.

column1: What? No Egg should know any moves.
\v[3] seems to know only one move...
Which move should be forgotten?
Hm! \v[3]'s \v[4]? That move should be forgotten?
column2: ¡Hm! ¿El \v[4] de \v[3]? ¿Quieres que ese movimiento sea olvidado?

column1: It worked to perfection!
\v[3] has forgotten \v[4] completely.

column2: El pronóstico del tiempo está en la tele...

column1: It's going to be fairly warm!
\bUh...\nOh, yes, I'm the Move Deleter.

column1: \bWould you like me to do that?
\bWhich Pokémon should forget a move?
\bCome again if there are moves that need to be forgotten.
column2: \bVuelve si hay movimientos que necesiten ser olvidados.

column1: \bWhat? No Egg should know any moves.
\bWhat? I can't make a Shadow Pokémon forget a move.
column2: \b¿Qué? No puedo hacer que un Pokémon Sombra olvide un movimiento.
